member.name: SFV_CREATE
member.summary: This structure is used with the function.

member.name: SFV_CREATE.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the SFV_CREATE structure, in bytes.

member.name: SFV_CREATE.pshf
member.summary: The interface of the folder for which to create the view.

member.name: SFV_CREATE.psvOuter
member.summary: A pointer to the parent interface. This parameter may be NULL. This parameter is used only when the view created by is hosted in a common dialog box.

member.name: SFV_CREATE.psfvcb
member.summary: A pointer to the interface that handles the view's callbacks when various events occur. This parameter may be NULL.
